file.name: allof.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: "http//example.com/api"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Example API
  description: Example API with a schema union
paths:
  /:
    get:
      operationId: list-data
      summary: List data
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/listData"

components:
  responses:
    listData:
      description: Returns a list of data sets
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            title: Data and Metadata
            allOf:
              - $ref: "#/components/schemas/data"
              - $ref: "#/components/schemas/metadata"

  schemas:
    metadata:
      title: Pagination Metadata
      type: object
      properties:
        page: { type: number }
    data:
      title: The Data
      type: object
      properties:
        size: { type: integer }
        thing: { type: string }
